item.title: Search Ends for Victims in Dominican Republic Roof Collapse That Killed 221
item.description: The collapse of the roof at Jet Set, one of Santo Domingo’s most popular nightclubs, killed many prominent Dominicans, including baseball players and ...

item.title: What Trump’s Tariffs Mean for Global Economy, and You
item.description: The newest wave of President Trump’s trade policies increased global uncertainty, causing stocks to fluctuate significantly.

item.title: Medicare Bleeds Billions on Pricey Bandages, and Doctors Get a Cut
item.description: Medicare spending on “skin substitutes” made of dried placenta has soared as doctors pocket lucrative discounts from sellers.

item.title: ‘They’re Coming After All of Us. So You Might As Well Tell the Truth.’
item.description: The longtime activist and writer Sarah Schulman on why now is the time to stand up to people you oppose.

item.title: Jon Hamm Finds His Way Back to the Hilltop
item.description: For the actor, the decade since “Mad Men” ended has been a period of personal change and mixed professional success. Suddenly, he is everywhere again.
